channel.title: How do i set up player rights
channel.description: Im so new to RSC development I need help with pretty much anything you guys can give me, such as how to make admins and owners and invisible? i know in a 317 RS2 its Playersright=0,1,2,3,4 but thats not in the .CFG files

item.title: How do i set up player rights
item.dc:creator: @BigBadSoft BigBadSoft
item.description:
@BigBadSoft wrote:

It makes the account muted.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set up player rights

item.title: How do i set up player rights
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

BigBadSoft:

what about the #red# for crowns and stuff?

If you want to create a red crown by typing #red#, then you will need to add the following method into your GameImage class, client sideâ€¦

		    if ((string.charAt(offset) == '#') && (offset + 4 < string.length()) && (string.charAt(offset + 4) == '#') && (string.substring(offset + 1, offset + 4).equalsIgnoreCase("red"))) {
          		   spriteClip4(x - 12, y - 16, 30, 20, 2339, 13369344, 0, 0, false);
          		   x += 14;
              	   offset += 4;
		    } else

The players rights, such as rank are defined in your Player class, and as Luke said, to make a player Admin/Owner, open the players CFG file, search for rank=0 (by default a regular member), and change it to rank=4

Read full topic
